entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain or snow near midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
